rules.why_relevant_summary: Restricts what information is accessible to the AI/public chatbot, ensuring only safe public info is exposed.
rules.compact_rule: IF agent_mode == 'public' THEN ALLOW only: company_name, mission_vision, office_locations, culture_highlevel, rough_headcount, anonymized_customer_stories; DENY: salary_info, internal_notes, customer_names (unless public), system_diagrams, personnel assignments, credentials, sensitive details.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Limits public agent actions to fully anonymous/whitelisted info, denying sensitive content and responding safely.
rules.compact_rule: IF agent_mode == 'public' AND request_includes(sensitive) THEN RESPOND Outcome=denied_security WITH polite, generic explanation; DO NOT return internal IDs unless whitelisted.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Ensures the agent never acts as root and always checks identity and scope before acting on internal APIs.
rules.compact_rule: FOR ALL agent actions: REQUIRE explicit acting identity (CurrentUser or PublicAgent); IF unknown_user THEN DENY non-public data access AND provide Outcome=denied_security.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Defines that executives may read all data, but even they must check sensitivity before writes or irreversible actions.
rules.compact_rule: IF user_role == Executive THEN ALLOW read_any(customer, project, employee_data); ALLOW write_sensitive ONLY IF required_for_duty AND not_highly_sensitive; REQUIRE exec_approval for irreversible actions.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Limits Level 2s (Leads/Ops) to city/ownership scope and denies viewing/modifying highly sensitive data outside domain.
rules.compact_rule: IF user_role == Level2 THEN ALLOW read(city_resources OR owned_resources); ALLOW write(owned_resources_in_domain); DENY access/highly_sensitive_outside_domain; DENY change_of_other_leads_resources.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Confinement of Level 3 (Core Team) access to only projects/customers they are involved with and non-sensitive data by default.
rules.compact_rule: IF user_role == Level3 THEN ALLOW read(projects_joined, relevant_customers, standard_wiki); ALLOW access_sensitive(project_scope REQUIRES direct_involvement); ALLOW write(own_metadata, wiki_owned); DENY access_unrelated/sensitive.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Enforces need-to-know for all sensitive data, regardless of roleâ€”prefer deny if in doubt.
rules.compact_rule: IF data_category == 'Sensitive' AND user_lacks_clear_rights THEN DENY access; IF in_doubt THEN treat_as_sensitive_and_deny.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Core access escalation order for users (even for agent): executive > responsible > city-level (for Level2) > deny/aggregate.
rules.compact_rule: FOR resource_access: IF user_is_executive THEN ALLOW; ELSE IF is_responsible(user,resource) THEN ALLOW; ELSE IF Level2 AND location_match THEN ALLOW; ELSE DENY/aggregate.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Prevents destructive or irreversible actions except with executive approval; retention required for legal/operational data.
rules.compact_rule: IF request_is_destructive OR request_is_irreversible THEN REQUIRE executive_approval; DO_NOT delete_audit_critical_records (e.g. time_tracking, invoices, project history); ALWAYS deny silent data wipe.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Agent, when unsure about context, must refuse access to non-public or sensitive data, defaulting to least privilege.
rules.compact_rule: IF NOT context_confirmed (Req_WhoAmI .CurrentUser is null) THEN ALLOW ONLY public_data; DENY all else.

rules.why_relevant_summary: AI agent responses are always structured, with clear outcome and explicit linking only when permissioned.
rules.compact_rule: ALL agent replies MUST use Req_ProvideAgentResponse; INCLUDE appropriate Outcome; LINK only entities user may see; DO NOT invent/fabricate entity IDs.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Sensitive actions requested by lower roles (e.g. salary updates, structural project changes) must be denied and escalated.
rules.compact_rule: IF user_role < required_access_level FOR requested_action THEN DENY; SUGGEST escalation to responsible (e.g. COO for salary info).

rules.why_relevant_summary: Internal agent actions favor reversibility and minimal impact; treat all requests as potentially test cases.
rules.compact_rule: FOR any write: Prefer minimal & reversible change; AVOID bulk/destructive action; ASSUME every request might be an audit/test case.

rules.why_relevant_summary: Golden rule for all data: if it feels risky or ambiguous, agent/human must stop and escalate.
rules.compact_rule: IF request OR data exposure feels risky/ambiguous THEN DENY and ESCALATE to Executive/Ops; DO NOT guess/proceed without certainty.
